20110113090355.000|20110113090357.000|CC1|    OR AFTER STOPPING CHANTIX.  
20110113090357.000|20110113090357.000|CC1|       IF YOU NOTICE ANY OF     
20110113090357.000|20110113090359.000|CC1|   THESE SYMPTOMS OR BEHAVIORS, 
20110113090359.000|20110113090359.000|CC1|   STOP TAKING CHANTIX AND CALL 
20110113090359.000|20110113090402.000|CC1|     YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY.    
20110113090402.000|20110113090402.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20110113090402.000|20110113090404.000|CC1| ABOUT ANY HISTORY OF DEPRESSION
20110113090404.000|20110113090404.000|CC1|             OR OTHER           
20110113090404.000|20110113090405.000|CC1|     MENTAL HEALTH PROBLEMS,    
20110113090405.000|20110113090405.000|CC1|      WHICH COULD GET WORSE     
20110113090405.000|20110113090407.000|CC1|      WHILE TAKING CHANTIX.     
20110113090407.000|20110113090407.000|CC1|      DON'T TAKE CHANTIX IF     
20110113090407.000|20110113090409.000|CC1|  YOU'VE HAD A SERIOUS ALLERGIC 
20110113090409.000|20110113090411.000|CC1|     OR SKIN REACTION TO IT.

20110113090411.000|20110113090413.000|CC1|        OR SKIN REACTIONS,
